snippet: Kei Nishikori made a winning return after three weeks out injured, beating Dusan Lajovic 7-5, 6-1 in the Swiss Indoors first round on Monday....
lead_paragraph: Kei Nishikori made a winning return after three weeks out injured, beating Dusan Lajovic 7-5, 6-1 in the Swiss Indoors first round on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Nishikori Makes Winning Return From Injury at Swiss Indoors
headline.main: Nishikori Makes Winning Return From Injury at Swiss Indoors
